text: aur jaan rakho ke tum mein Allah ke rasool(sallallahu alaihiwasallam) maujoodh hai, agar wo tumhaara kaha karte rahe, bahuth umoor mein to tum mushkil mein pad jaao, lekin Allah taâ€™ala ne imaan ko tumhaare liye mehboob bana diya hai , aur ose tumhaare dilo mein zeenath de rakhi hai aur kufr ko aur gunaah ko aur na farmaani ko tumhaari nigaaho mein na pasandida bana diya hai, yahi log raah yaafta hai
